apps.name: LiveRedirect
apps.subtitle: Redirect any URLs to LiveContainer! (iOS <26)
apps.localizedDescription:
Open matching webpages in LiveContainer from Safari on iOS using a lightweight Safari Web Extension.

What it does:
• Lets you maintain a list of URL or domain patterns (e.g., discord.com/invite, youtube.com).
• When a visited page matches, the content script encodes the full URL as Base64 and redirects to: livecontainer://open-web-page?url=<base64>
• Manage patterns directly in the extension popup (add, delete, import, export).

Using the extension:
Important: Sideload with app extensions enabled to use extension!
• Add a pattern such as discord.com/invite or just github.com.
• Visit a matching page; you should be redirected to the LiveContainer URL.
• Import/Export via clipboard (JSON or newline list). The popup performs clipboard reads/writes only on user action.

apps.name: Pocket Poster
apps.subtitle: Custom PosterBoard Wallpapers for iOS 17+
apps.localizedDescription:
# Pocket Poster
Custom PosterBoard animated wallpapers for iOS 17.0+

Community-made wallpapers can be found on the [official Cowabun.ga site](https://cowabun.ga/wallpapers). Join the [Cowabunga Discord Server](https://discord.gg/cowabunga) for additional help.

## Getting Started
Since there is no way to read files currently, you will need a computer to get the App Hash/UUID.

Download [Nugget](https://github.com/leminlimez/Nugget) on your computer and plug in your phone. Then, navigate to the `Settings` page and click the `Pocket Poster Helper` button. Inside Pocket Poster, click the `Detect` button inside of settings.

## Credits
- Translations crowdsourced using [POEditor][POEditorJoin]. Thank you everyone who assisted in the translation effort!
- [PosterRestore][PosterRestoreDiscord] for their help with PosterBoard
- [dootskyre][dootskyreX] for the fallback shortcut
- [Nathan](https://github.com/verygenericname) and [DuyKhanhTran](https://github.com/khanhduytran0) for the exploit

[POEditorJoin]: https://poeditor.com/join/project/MPZOsunwVj
[PosterRestoreDiscord]: https://discord.gg/gWtzTVhMvh
[dootskyreX]: https://x.com/dootskyre

versions.localizedDescription:
# Features
- Added an in-app explore page for finding and downloading wallpapers
- Added custom CarPlay wallpapers (will not work on iOS 26.0)
- *Preliminary* iOS 16 support (not all wallpapers will work)
- Improved certain error messages

# Bug Fixes
- Fixed the aspect ratio/rotation of imported custom videos
- Fixed the update API not being called correctly
- Fixed issues with some alerts not popping up
- Other various app stability improvements

- Changed how the app hash is gotten (Requires [Nugget v6.1.1 or newer](https://github.com/leminlimez/Nugget/releases/latest))
- Pocket Poster now prompts when there is an update available
- Reset Collections button now falls back to the tutorial screen from v1.0 on iOS 17.0
- Added new languages:
  - Bulgarian
  - Chinese (simplified)
  - French (LU)
  - Italian
- Fixed a bug where the app hash would be pasted incorrectly

This version is outdated, you can find the latest version [here](https://github.com/leminlimez/Pocket-Poster/releases/latest).

# Features
- Added video wallpapers! Select videos from your camera roll and use them as wallpapers.
- The "Reset Collections" button now works automatically
- Added translations for 21 new languages!
  - Available languages: Arabic, Arabic (Saudi Arabia), Arabic (Egypt), Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Dutch, French, French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (Switzerland), German, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Spanish (Mexico), Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
  - Thank you to all the amazing translators who helped make this project more accessible! This would not have been possible without you!
  - If you would like to help translate, you can join the effort over on [POEditor](https://poeditor.com/join/project/MPZOsunwVj)
- Improved the UI
- Prepared for CarPlay hash (coming in v3.0)

# Bug Fixes
- Improved backend handling of the app
- Fixed problems with alert popups not showing
- Improved error messages
- Improved cache clean up
- Fixed memory leak when applying that would lead to a crash

- Initial Release
  - Only .tendies files are currently supported. Configuration-based tendies will not work, however those are rare.

**Note:** You will need [Nugget v5.2.3 or newer](https://github.com/leminlimez/Nugget) to get the app hash.

apps.name: Get More Ram
apps.subtitle: A simple AltSign wrapper app that allows you to enable "Increased Memory Limit" to your sideloaded apps without using Xcode
apps.localizedDescription:
# Get More Ram
A simple [StosSign](https://github.com/stossy11/StosSign) wrapper app that allows you to enable "Increased Memory Limit" for your sideloaded apps without using Xcode.

# How to use
1. Sideload this app
2. Go to settings, sign in your account that you used to sign the app you want to enable "Increased Memory Limit"
3. Go to "App IDs" page
4. Tap Refresh
5. Tap the app you want to enable "Increased Memory Limit"
6. Tap "Add Increased Memory Limit"
7. Reinstall the app from SideStore/AltStore
8. Check if you have "Increased Memory Limit"

# Credits
Stossy11 - For StosSign.
SideStore - Anisette Data fetching codes are stolen from SideStore

versions.localizedDescription: This is a nightly release [created automatically with GitHub Actions workflow](https://github.com/hugeBlack/GetMoreRam/actions/runs/14164044325/attempts/1).

apps.name: Reddit Filter
apps.subtitle: iOS Tweak - Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed

versions.localizedDescription:
# RedditFilter v2025.37.0-1.1.8

## Changes

- Fix app crash (@NicholasBly)
- Fix ad comments showing under posts (@Laitinlok)
- Fix popular feed not showing with recommendations disabled
- Move RedditFilter settings to the user drawer / side bar (accessed by tapping the profile picture in the top right)

## SHA256

- `1e33615cc37168e84256fd6c487a77cf8b11fe187532daf7331b707b664c07e3`  packages/RedditFilter_2025.37.0-1.1.8.ipa
- `1aabd2f0656e6ec4b26fa38f4b5e10bb2d4465c0c6e087e3d57da57a06799f83`  packages/com.level3tjg.redditfilter_1.1.8_iphoneos-arm.deb
- `e871f455aa868a25a7ea1fd40ef3b19a7a7ade21aa4162e0b26d94dab9f31c12`  packages/com.level3tjg.redditfilter_1.1.8_iphoneos-arm64.deb

# RedditFilter v2025.07.1-1.1.7

## Changes

- Fixed feed filter settings not appearing in app settings
- Fixed missing feed filter settings icon
- Fixed some recommendations still showing up in the home feed

# RedditFilter v2024.44.2-1.1.6

## Changes

- Fixed "Incorrect username or password" error when logging in with correct username and password

# RedditFilter v2024.26.0-1.1.6

## Changes

- Fixed a crash occurring during some web requests
- Fixed NSFW icon not appearing in feed filter settings

# RedditFilter v2024.18.0-1.1.5

## Changes
- Updated Reddit app to 2024.18.0
- Fixed issues when logging in using username and password
- Fixed awards toggle image not appearing

# RedditFilter v2024.17.0-1.1.4

## Changes

- Updated Reddit app to 2024.17.0
- Fix promoted content showing in News and Popular feeds
- Remove version spoof code added in 1.1.2

# RedditFilter 2024.12.0-1.1.3

## Changes
- Fix promoted content still showing in comments

news.title: LiveRedirector Solution for iOS 26!
news.caption: Fix broken sideloaded Safari extension using Userscripts + Shortcuts
